title: Seeing a scorpion in a dream

preview.html: This is what we know in detail in this article, so follow us for more through our explanatory website. Seeing a scorpion in a dream for a single girl. A scorpion in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of the presence of an enemy in her life and she must pay attention to him and pay attention to him so that he is safe from his harm and evil. It can indicate A scorpion in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that there is someone who knows her and hates her. She hopes that the blessings in her life will disappear and that her condition will deteriorate. She should not trust anyone easily so as not to fall into evil and evil. The small size of the scorpion in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the presence of a weak enemy in her life. Her life. And you can confront it and overcome its evil and evil, God willing. A scorpion stings an unmarried girl in a dream, which indicates that there are people around her who wish her evil and harm. They are planning her machinations and misfortunes, and she is already involved in problems and crises. For this reason, it is necessary to be careful. Extreme caution in the coming period, and God is the best protector. If an unmarried woman sees a scorpion stinging her face in a dream. This indicates that she will be severely harmed by some people around her, which will cause her problems and crises in her life. The black scorpion in the dream of an unmarried girl indicates... A married woman indicates the presence of a person who severely oppressed the girl and influenced her for a long time. Or it indicates the black magic of some evil people and those who hate him. He must strengthen himself with the Qur’an and daily supplications to escape this evil. An unmarried woman killed a scorpion in a dream, a sign of her victory over the enemies of her life. And her peace. Of the machinations and misfortunes that she will manage. See also: Interpretation of a dream of a black scorpion for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a scorpion in a dream for a married woman. The appearance of a scorpion in a married woman’s dream indicates that there will be disagreements between her and her family in the coming period. She must govern her affairs rationally and wisely so as not to fall into disputes and problems, with permission. God. A scorpion sting for a married woman in a dream is an indication of the emergence of problems and disagreements between her and her husband that may end in divorce. Killing a scorpion in a married woman’s dream means getting rid of the troubles and differences that she was going through, and a period of calm and psychological stability begins in the family, God willing. Seeing a married woman In a dream, she burns scorpions. A sign that she is a woman who can take charge well. The ability to solve her problems and crises, and get rid of what hinders her life with great skill and good behavior. The presence of black scorpions in a married woman’s dream indicates that she is surrounded by many evil people. I wish them to lose Blessings that they live by and fall into problems and crises, and they have to be careful or trust anyone easily. If a married woman sees a white scorpion in a dream. This is an indication of the presence of a spoiled friend in her life who holds a grudge and hatred towards her life. He wants to get her into problems and quarrels between her and her. Her husband and destroys her home. The married woman must beware or avoid this friend so that she does not fall into trouble and is safe from harm, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a scorpion in a dream about a man and its meaning. Scorpio in a married man’s dream, an indication

title: Interpretation of seeing a large car in a dream - a truck in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a bus, a coach, and a small transport vehicle in the dream of a single, married, and pregnant girl, either buying or driving and driving. Seeing Ibn Sirin’s cars. Imagine with me that you are in a small car or even a medium-sized bus or coach, and if you see a large truck coming and speeding in the direction you are in, how do you feel? Of course you will feel terrified and terrified, and the truck is the main means of transportation used to transport machinery or furniture to another of the many uses for which trucks are used, such as commercial reasons. Scientists and interpreters have concluded that seeing a truck or transportation vehicles in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer is a person who has... Great inclinations towards trade and entering into commercial activity and engaging in it. The other indicators that we will mention in the following lines are not related to the arrival or obtaining of maintenance. Seeing a large and small truck in a dream. We also mentioned that seeing a truck or transport vehicle in a dream symbolizes the arrival of goodness or livelihood, especially if the viewer is the owner of a commercial project, and therefore the larger the size. The bigger the truck the better, whether it is good is profit or money. As for seeing a small truck in a dream, it symbolizes one of the small business projects and this vision portends the coming profit and money, if this truck is full of goods and goods in the dream, but if the truck is empty This is an unpleasant vision because it may portend loss, God forbid. As for seeing a large truck and huge transport vehicles in a dream of transporting goods and goods between different countries, this vision symbolizes the establishment of huge and massive projects that will bring huge financial benefits to their owners. Seeing yourself driving or driving Truck in a dream To see that you are driving any of the different means of transportation, this is of great importance, which indicates responsibility on your shoulders and shoulders, and therefore the more means of transportation you drive, the greater your responsibility as well (a direct proportion). Driving a truck in a dream means advancement in positions Administrative and operational if the truck is used for commercial matters such as cargo. He performs his duties properly. Seeing a truck loaded with cloth or iron, valuable goods, and goods is the best vision in which a truck is seen, while one of the worst visions of a truck in a dream is a truck carrying coal, lime, and stones, as it symbolizes a low standard of living and anxiety. Seeing a truck loaded with bananas Or apples or pears, as well as loaded with cows and horses, or loaded with fish or chicks, are among the good dreams that portend good money and a lot of good things. Seeing in a dream that I am buying a truckThe best vision of buying a truck in a dream is buying a large truck that is light in color and not dark, as it indicates This vision leads to working in a prestigious position or assuming an important position in the company or department and body in which he works. He works and may herald a business that will bring him abundant profit, and the larger and more beautiful the truck is, the greater the goodness, profit and blessing. Seeing a red truck in a dream. We also mentioned that the truck

title: Interpretation of seeing a princess in a dream in different situations

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a princess in a dream in different situations. Princesses are characters that express a distinguished position in society, high status, and money. Seeing a princess in a dream is considered a positive and promising dream that indicates that the dreamer will gain an important position or that he will achieve long-awaited achievements in his real life. These interpretations and possibilities vary from person to person. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing the princess in a dream in different situations. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the princess in a dream These visions are a big world with different symbols and meanings, and there are many people interested in their dreams and their interpretation, and today we present together the interpretation of the dream of the princess in a dream, as it is one of the things that It is commendable. Visions, as the princess in a dream indicates a high position and high status. This means that in the future he will obtain a prestigious position, a high and high position. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a prince in a dream for a single woman. A single woman always waits for God’s happy skin, always dreams of her dream boy and her hot knight and hopes that God will be happy and give her eternal happiness. She is at the peak of her life. Dream girl beautiful. Many: A prince in a dream symbolizes a good and spacious life. For an unmarried woman to feed her in a dream from a prince means that she will get married and obtain a great livelihood. A prince from another country symbolizes that she will marry a man from another city or work outside the country. The prince’s white clothes in a dream It symbolizes that the dreamer will marry a man of good morals whose conduct is not tainted by anything. Seeing an unmarried woman in a royal or princely palace means that she will obtain a prominent position in the coming period. A private conversation with the prince with good morals symbolizes a high and lofty position for the coming period. The prince in the dream indicates To eternal bliss and happiness. Giving a prince a gift to a girl in a dream indicates the good that she will receive and she will be completely satisfied with it. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a prince in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman is waiting for God’s good news, as she combines feelings of fear and longing at the same time. Scientists interpret with goodness the vision of a prince and a princess in a pregnant woman’s dream, because it is considered a praiseworthy vision. A prince’s dream of a pregnant woman in a dream indicates that she will give birth to a handsome male son with a beautiful appearance and a beautiful face. Seeing a pregnant princess in a dream symbolizes the birth of a beautiful woman. Seeing The pregnant wife of a prince in a dream is interpreted as being given what she wants and desires. Interpretation of a dream about seeing princes in a dream for a manThe great scholar Al-Nabulsi, one of the eminent scholars of dream interpretation, interprets a dream about a prince as a broad, good and abundant diet. A prince in a bachelor’s dream indicates that he will get married soon The man’s dream indicates that he is a prince who will reach the highest ranks and the wealth that awaits him in the future. The removal of the prince from his position in the man’s dream means that he will face difficulties in the future. The prince who gives the dreamer food and money symbolizes that the dreamer will obtain a large and abundant livelihood. Dreams are part of The mind's thinking and imagination. It occurs during sleep because it is late

title: Interpretation of a dream about praying in the rain

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing prayer in the rain in a dream? Is it something that indicates optimism and goodness or is it evidence of evil? Many different questions and thoughts that are repeated in the minds of many who have seen this vision before, and you may also know the lion in a dream. We find that this topic has many different interpretations depending on the social and psychological state of the pioneer, his relationship with his Lord, etc., and we will talk about this. In the following content. What is the interpretation of seeing a prayer in the rain in a dream? The interpretation of seeing a prayer in the rain in a dream has many different interpretations, which are often related to the dreamer’s condition, and in general he will find that whoever sees himself praying in the rain in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer is He is on his way to achieving his dreams soon, and everything he wants will happen in life. As for whoever sees himself screaming and crying while praying in the rain in a dream, this largely indicates the end of corruption and strife around him, and there is another interpretation that says this indicates a tight diet and lack of money. . And relief, and this is basically the interpretation when the dreamer is standing in the rain and cannot say the supplication, and other interpretations that may also differ if the dreamer is married or not. Praying in the rain in a dream There is a different interpretation of seeing begging in the rain in a dream if the dreamer is married and he is And his wife is planning to get pregnant. Basically, the interpretation of this dream is that God is giving him good news. Of pregnancy near his wife, or if the witness is unknown and prays in the rain, this is his interpretation that there will be good news and soon relief in the family. If the dreamer sees himself praying in the mosque at the same time that it is raining, this symbolizes comfort and the end of worry. And grief, as some scholars explain it. This dreamer is a teenager, and this indicates that he is on his way to escape from bad friends and will soon reform. Read more: Interpretation of seeing a promotion in a dreamInterpretation of praying in the rain by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that the interpretation of seeing prayer in the rain in a dream, especially if the dreamer is in a dark place but hears The sound of rain, this indicates that he discovered some shocking facts about a person close to him, and Ibn Sirin also believes that if the priest cries loudly during his supplication in a dream during the rain, this indicates his very bad psychological state and that this matter will take a long time for him to regain energy from New and healthy. If the dreamer stands in the rain with a large number of people during prayer, this indicates positive changes that could distort his life and future. It also indicates a change in life circumstances for the better. However, if the dreamer is not married, some believe that the interpretation of this symbolizes his closeness to his marriage. And the birth of children in a short time. Prayer in the rain for married, single and divorced women. If the dreamer is an unmarried woman and sees herself praying in the rain in her dream, this indicates success in the future and in the current life, blessing in her money, and other happy occasions that will enter her life, whether she is a dreamer. . She is a married woman, and who

title: Interpretation of seeing Surat Maryam in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Surat Maryam in a dream. In Ali’s Zakat, we present new Arabic content that suits the Arab visitor, and we will present to you the interpretation based on the most famous and well-known books of interpretation by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Katheer.Interpretation of seeing Surat Maryam in a dream. Interpretation of a dream with Surat Maryam. Surah Maryam is one of the Meccan surahs, with the exception of a few Verses, including the urban verses. It is one of the blessed surahs in which the names of many prophets are mentioned. Therefore, seeing it in a dream, reading it, or hearing it is a good thing and a blessing and good news in both worlds. Interpretation of seeing Surat Maryam for NabulusImam Nabulsi will explain Surat Maryam in a dream that the appearance Surah Maryam in a dream means comfort in closeness to God for the dreamer. He will be with the prophets mentioned in the surah, God Almighty willing. The dreamer is described as one who revived the prophetic Sunnah and promised them. If not, then this is a telegram from God regarding the covenant, just as God has love for the righteous, and he will receive sustenance. Soon, and if he loses it, God will guide him. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Maryam by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin explained Surat Maryam in a dream that whoever sees Surat Maryam in his dream will be exposed to lies and slander, but God will justify him and save him. He too may go astray, but God will lead him to the right path. Surah Maryam In a dream, it heralds comfort after distress, sustenance, and repentance after going astray. Whoever reads it in a dream or something from it, or if it is read to him, inform Aisha and Ja`far al-Sadiq, and God Almighty agrees with them, may God grant him peace. May God bless him and grant him peace, with his love of righteous people, and he makes a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Maryam in a dream about the millennium. The millennium has come: Then Aisha, may God be pleased with her, the Almighty, said to her that whoever recites Surat Maryam in a dream, God will forgive him. It was said that the reciter of Surat Maryam in a dream comes to life. The Sunnah of the Prophets and may God grant him the love of the righteous. Today, through the “Moments” website, we presented to you the interpretation of a dream about Surat Maryam in a dream. If you have questions or dreams looking for an interpretation, share your comments with us and our experts will respond to them as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a snake by Ibn Sirin and its effects in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a snake by Ibn Sirin: The snake is considered a type of animal and belongs to the reptile family, as it has many different sizes and colors, but it is known and cannot be claimed to be a harmful reptile that can lead to the death of a person immediately, and it can be found most of the time in desert places because of its From its awesome ability to withstand extreme heat, and many factors that exist in the desert, including humidity and others. Interpretation of a dream about a snake by Ibn SirinIt is known that the snake is considered a harmful animal, as it harms living creatures and humans when it bites, while the snake is considered a harmful animal. A dream The snakeHe came up with these many interpretations, which he gave to us as dream interpreters: While seen in a dream, without being afraid of him, he can bring indications of the strength of character that the individual has. He is also a man of courage and faces difficulties in the event that the dreamer is not afraid of him. As It is one of the signs that he has earned a place with them and can raise his status with it. While seeing a snake in the house, this is a sign of many problems that will befall him. While when a man sees a snake, this indicates his many problems with his wife. A wife who sees a snake It is a sign that her children are jealous. Many interpreters have interpreted that the snake has many interpretations that differ, depending on the details of the dreamer’s dream. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing collecting pumpkins from the ground in a dream and its consequences. Seeing a snake attacking my daughter. It was mentioned in the snake that its bite was one of the bites Which was considered fatal, as a result of the poison spreading inside the human body, while the person did not receive the necessary first aid immediately. And in a dream about a snake attacking my daughter, he found these clues: It can be considered a sign that the child is in danger and you must be careful. When you see the unmarried girl If a snake bites a girl twice in a dream, this indicates a new life for the dreamer. And she will be happy. preview.text: Interpretation of a dream about a snake by Ibn Sirin: The snake is considered a type of animal and belongs to the reptile family, as it has many different sizes and colors, but it is known and cannot be claimed to be a harmful reptile that can lead to the death of a person immediately, and it can be found most of the time in desert places because of its From its awesome ability to withstand extreme heat, and many factors that exist in the desert, including humidity and others. Interpretation of a dream about a snake by Ibn SirinIt is known that the snake is considered a harmful animal, as it harms living creatures and humans when it bites, while the snake is considered a harmful animal. title: Interpretation of milk in a dream: Drinking milk in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of milk whether it is pure, dirty, hot or cold from the breast. Powdered milk is given in a dream to a married and pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin. Distributing milk, bathing and washing with milk. Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation of milk in a dream. Seeing milk is a sign of instinct, motherhood, kindness and mercy of the dreamer. Seeing milk indicates the good sense of the dreamer, and also indicates the dreamer’s livelihood and money obtained in a lawful way. It is said that seeing milk in a dream indicates a happy and peaceful life dominated by comfort and prosperity. A lot of milk in a dream. The dream is a sign of great wealth and high status. Whoever sees in his dream that there is a lot of milk and trades it, the dream indicates the profit and money that the dreamer earns and earns in reality. If the dreamer distributes free milk to people in his dream, then the dream indicates good deeds that It is carried out by the individual in his reality. Bathing with milk in a dream indicates good company and loyal friends whom the dreamer will gain knowledge in reality. Drinking milk in a dream indicates the blessing and goodness that the dreamer will obtain. If the dreamer is a farmer, then seeing him drinking milk in a dream indicates a blessing that affects His harvest, which brings him abundant profit and money. If the dreamer is traveling, then his vision indicates the success and help that he will find on his journey. And for an unmarried or unmarried woman, if one of them sees in a dream that he is drinking milk, then his vision indicates the joy and pleasure that will enter his heart and his marriage in the coming days. Next.If a married woman drinks milk in a dream, then her vision means raising offspring and pregnancy. In the event that a woman is pregnant and sees in her dream that she is drinking milk, then her vision indicates the ease and convenience that she finds in childbirth, as well as the health and safety that her fetus enjoys. Seeing milk from Far away in a dream indicates your search for protection, warmth, and comfort. Seeing dairy products in a dream indicates fertility. The presence of milk in the dreams of single people indicates the conclusion of new serious relationships. Milk is a symbol of luck and good and sincere friendships. Drinking milk in a dream indicates fertility and health. Pouring milk on the ground in a dream indicates loss of money, Which may be in trade. Seeing sour milk in a dream indicates a quarrel. Seeing breast milk or seeing a mother breastfeeding her child is a sign of good omen and happiness. Milk in a dream can indicate a new baby. Dreaming of being washed with milk is a good thing for a woman and a good sign for someone who wants to get married. As for a man, this dream It indicates a wrong choice, especially in the field of work. Drinking cold milk in a dream is a sign of protection from bad luck. Drinking warm milk indicates a woman’s desire to discredit you. Drinking milk from a woman’s breast indicates that you are surrendering to a woman’s control and rule, or that you will become her friend if you know her. Buy Milk indicates happiness, prosperity, and wealth. To see milk in a dream indicates fatigue, sadness, and problems in reality. Whoever sees in his dream milk that is not

title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing a fox in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Alopecia in a dream Alopecia is an immune disease, but it is not contagious and causes hair loss in a specific area of ​​the scalp or intermittently, and when a person is attacked by it in reality, he feels sad and disturbed by that, and if the dreamer sees alopecia in a dream, he is surprised and impressed by it and rushes to find out about it. Interpretation of the vision and psychologists believe that the vision carries many interpretations, and here in this article we consider together the most important things that were said about this dream. Fox in a dreamIf the dreamer sees in a dream that he is suffering from alopecia, this means that he will suffer from envy and the evil eye in those days. In If the dreamer sees that he has alopecia in a dream, this means that there are many people who hate him and are close to him and he must be careful of them. And when the dreamer sees in a dream that he has been exposed to alopecia, it indicates some good things that will happen to her, and perhaps something Bad may happen to her, and God knows best. And if the monarch sees in a dream that God has given him recovery from alopecia, this means that he will rejoice in the end of problems and judgments and the beginning of joys and happy events. In general, seeing a vixen in a dream indicates a lot of accumulated thinking and fears that he is dealing with. The dreamer. If the dreamer sees that his daughter has alopecia and her hair is falling out, this means that the date of her engagement is approaching and a good young man will die and she will be happy with him. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her hair is falling out and she is suffering from hair loss, this means that the pain and sadness that she suffered will end. Dream Interpretation SecretsThe expert includes a team of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the country. The website is in Arabic. To access it, type a page on the Internet Secrets of Dream Interpretation on Google. Alopecia in a dream by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing alopecia and losing the dreamer’s hair means that he will face many problems and lose money or the job he is working on. Seeing alopecia in a dream means humiliation that will happen to some people If the dreamer sees in a dream that she has alopecia, this means that she will face some problems and lose important things in her life. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he has alopecia in the front of his head, this indicates the bad luck he is exposed to, and it may include losing his status among people and losing his job. If a young man sees in his dream that he has alopecia in the back of his head, this means that he will turn gray before he grows old and it will be difficult for him to achieve some things. And when the sleeper sees the hair on the right side of his hair falling out and becoming bald, this portends a misfortune that he will regret. A quarrelsome woman in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is afflicted with alopecia, this means that she has the evil eye and that the blessings she enjoys will disappear because of it. And if a girl sees that she is afflicted with alopecia in a dream, this means that she will be blessed with good thinking, intelligence, and psychological comfort, and if She was sick and was cured. And if the girl was suffering from problems and saw that she was afflicted with disease

title: Interpretation of a dream about receiving a prayer rug in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about taking a prayer rug in a dream If you are looking for an interpretation of a dream about taking a prayer rug in a dream, one of the dreams that many wanted to know the interpretation of this vision, let us get to know its interpretation from some diligent translators and the reader must realize that it is from the jurisprudence of scholars. The site does not earn its income from interpretations, but rather from diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream about receiving a prayer rug in a dream: Any person who dreams that he took a prayer rug may indicate the strength of his faith and connection to religion. A person’s dream that he took a prayer rug in a dream may indicate The dreamer's conditions are good during this time. Whoever dreams that he took a prayer rug may indicate facilitation of things and positive changes that occur in his life in those days. In the event that a person sees that he took a prayer rug in a dream, this may indicate the fulfillment of the dreamer's desires and goals in that period. And God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of obtaining a gold bullion in a dream: Anyone who sees in a dream that he obtained a gold bullion may indicate the abundance of sustenance that will come to the dreamer in the coming period. The dream of obtaining a gold bullion in a dream may indicate happy events that will come to the dreamer. During this time, thanks to God. Seeing an alloy of gold in a dream may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. If someone sees that he has obtained an alloy of gold, this may indicate his closeness to God, Blessed and Most High, and getting rid of it. Of sins and disobedience, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about getting a watermelon from someone in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that he got a watermelon, may indicate the dreamer’s achievements during that period. Whoever sees that he took a watermelon from someone may indicate that he heard happy news about The dreamer in those days. In case one believes that he took a watermelon from someone, this may indicate the happiness and joy that the dreamer feels during this period. Seeing a watermelon being taken by someone in a dream may indicate happy events and good changes in the dreamer’s life during This time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about receiving chicken eggs in a dream: Anyone who sees in a dream that he received chicken eggs indicates positive changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period. In the event that there is a personal opinion that he received chicken eggs in a dream, it can This indicates a lot of money that the dreamer obtains during this period. In the event that there is a personal opinion that he obtained chicken eggs in a dream, this can indicate getting rid of the fears and problems that the dreamer was facing at that time. Seeing eggs taken in A dream can indicate happy events and positive changes that will happen to the dreamer in his life, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about getting pants in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he is wearing pants, it may indicate the happiness that the dreamer will gain in the coming days. Whoever sees in a dream that he took pants from A person, it may indicate that he will be freed from sins and transgressions and will become closer to God Almighty. Wearing pants in

title: The 15 most important interpretations by Ibn Sirin of seeing a dream about a tree

preview.html: Learn more about the interpretation of seeing a tree in a dream and its meaning. The tree in a dream generally symbolizes the age of the person, and the interpretation of the vision varies from one person to another, and the interpretation also varies according to the social status of the dreamer and according to his psychological state. Interpretation of the dream of a tree Sheikh Muhammad bin Sirin says: Seeing the beautiful tree with a wonderful shape, a vision It indicates that the dreamer has a good heart and good morals. A person dreams of a tree with a bad and ugly shape, this indicates that the dreamer has bad qualities. Seeing a beautiful tree with a green color is a sign that the dreamer is ready to do good and good deeds. Seeing in a dream that he is cutting down a tree , a vision indicating that the Wonder Woman has stopped his mercy. A beautiful tree with picturesque flowers in a dream indicates that the dreamer will live a beautiful and happy life. What is the interpretation of a fruit tree in a dream? Fruit trees in a dream symbolize women and also indicate the blessings that God has given to people. A vision A dry tree bearing fruit in a dream indicates abundance of sustenance and the dreamer’s kindness and guidance. Seeing a fruitful rose bush is a vision that foretells the dreamer’s guidance and righteousness. A person dreams that he is sitting under a fruit tree, then this indicates that God is satisfied with whomever he sees, and if this person is not righteous, God will guide him, God willing. A person dreams of a lemon tree and the tree has ripe and beautiful fruits, which indicates that he is an honest person who wants to do what he says. Interpretation of trees in a dream Seeing trees in a dream whose leaves do not fall is a vision that portends the dreamer a long life and abundant sustenance. Evergreen trees in a dream indicate the dreamer's desire for his principles and commitment to the affairs of his religion and symbolize the perpetuation of God's blessings upon the dreamer. Seeing a man sleeping on a tree in a dream means that the dreamer will be blessed by God with many children. Planting trees in a dream and succeeding in planting them is a good vision that promises the dreamer By lineage with a family of honorable people. Planting fruit trees in a dream indicates an increase in the dreamer’s livelihood in terms of money and children. Whereas if one sees in his dream that he is cutting down a fruit tree, this indicates that the dreamer and his family are exposed to some health problems. Seeing a tree in a dream, scholars say about The evil of seeing trees in a dream is that an unknown tree symbolizes worries and sorrows. Seeing fruitless trees in a dream indicates the stinginess of the priest. But if he sees palm trees or walnuts in a dream, this indicates that the people are among the heads of the people, but they are stingy, and it will not be taken from them until after Fatigue and exhaustion. Seeing trees with fallen leaves in a dream indicates the lack of permanence of blessings. It also indicates poverty and also indicates a change in the dreamer’s condition between joy and sadness, wealth and poverty. Seeing a tree with thorns is a sign of a person who is not soft and difficult to convince of anything. A dream about a person taking fruit from a tree that does not produce this type of fruit indicates that the dreamer will earn a lot of money. Cutting down a fruit tree in a dream for a married man is a vision that indicates that the man has lost his wife. If one sees the bark of the tree in a dream, this is a sign that The dreamer will find blessings and goodness in
